extensionDescription.message: Streamus turns YouTube into the music player you always wanted. Streamus makes streaming YouTube refreshingly easy.

nextVideoCommandDescription.message: Go to the next video in the stream

previousVideoCommandDescription.message: Go to the previous video in the stream

saveVideoCommandDescription.message: Add the current video to the current playlist

deleteVideoCommandDescription.message: Remove the current video from the stream

copyVideoTitleUrlCommandDescription.message: Copy the current video's title and URL

save.description: Just the singular word, as seen on a button.

enqueue.description: Add a playlist or video to the stream. It won't start playing -- it is simply queued up.

delete.description: Just the singular word, as seen on a button.

banUntilClear.description: Ban means don't allow showing/selection, remove semi-permanently. Clear is synonymous with empty.

clearStream.description: An action -- empty the stream of items

working.description: An action -- Streamus is working/processing something

installed.description: Descriptor on a button, the state of Streamus is now 'installed'

highest.description: Descriptor for top tier quality, 100% highest audio quality. Seen in a drop-down.

auto.description: Descriptor for automatic quality selection. Seen in a drop-down.

lowest.description: Descriptor for lowest quality selection. Seen in a drop-down.

addErrorCheckUrl.message: There was an issue adding your playlist. Check the URL?

reloadPromptText.message: Streamus is taking a long time to load. Reloading may help.

searchInstructions.message: Start searching and results will appear here

createPlaylistPromptText.message: Enter a name for the playlist or use the one provided:

deletePlaylistPromptText.message: Are you sure you want to delete playlist

clearStreamPromptText.message: Click OK to clear your stream

selectPlaylistPlaceholder.message: Type to create a playlist or filter your existing playlists

backPreviousVideoDisabled.message: There's no video to go back to

youTubePlayerErrorInvalidParameter.message: The request contains an invalid parameter value. For example, this error occurs if you specify a video ID that does not have 11 characters, or if the video ID contains invalid characters, such as exclamation points or asterisks.

youTubePlayerErrorVideoNotFound.message: Video requested is not found. This occurs when a video has been removed or it has been marked as private.

youTubePlayerErrorNoPlayEmbedded.message: Video requested does not allow playback in the embedded players.

cantGoBackToPreviousVideo.message: Can't go back to previous video.

whyNotAddAVideoFromAPlaylistOr.message: Why not add a video from a playlist or

resultsWillAppearAsYouSearch.message: Results will appear as you search
